Paragraph.Text: A lift with a piston which raises and lowers a platform. A wireless connection to your suit allows the lift to raise or lower automatically to your location when you approach the lift shaft. This can be augmented with a manual control module to allow precise movement at the behest of anyone using the lift. A lift can move significantly faster when not encumbered by the weight of a player, and will do so if a player is detected near the lift shaft at any height reachable by the lift.

Interact (default 'E') with the lift to adjust the maximum range, fine tune with alternate interact (default 'Shift+E'). Upgrade the lift with powered compressors to regenerate gas faster, maintaining performance for heavily-used lifts. A powered compressor is already required for the lift to extend beyond 64m (32m in lowest detail setting).
